app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate OkTalk Keyboard Translator
app_description: OkTalk Translator is a handy translator for travels business and study. You will get instant translation to 110 languages by Voice Text Camera or Keyboard. This powerful combination will give you an opportunity to feel confident in every corner of the world. Voice Translation Translate conversations and separate phrases by Voice recognition function. Use text translations for words sentences and long texts. Camera Translation Bring the camera on the object and find its translation to any of language. Camera recognizes as objects as well as text on the objects: menus signboards magazines etc. AR Translation Translate the world around you with augmented reality. Translator Keyboard Now you can translate right in your Messenger or email! No need for additional jumping over tabs and apps. Write in your native language and send in any language just clicking one single button on the keyboard! Offline Mode No Internet connection No problem! Text translations are available in the offline mode. Translation Widget Set up widget on your iPhone. Easy and fast access to the translations without even opening the app. Apple Watch Install Widget in your Apple Watch and get translations even faster and in more comfortable way! Phrasebook Over 2000 most used phrases are included. Siri Shortcuts Add shortcuts to Siri to get your translations even faster. How can you use OkTalk Translator Apply a smart assistance in caf√© restaurants shop pharmacy taxi and hotel booking during your trips. Use OkTalk as personal facilitator having small talks and asking for direction. Translate boards and signs through camera get help from locals using simultaneous voice translation. Here is a list of available languages for translate: Afrikaans Albanian Arabic Armenian Azerbaijani Basque Belarusian Bengali Bosnian Bulgarian Catalan Cebuano Chichewa Chinese Simplified Chinese Traditional Croatian Czech Danish Dutch English Esperanto Estonian Filipino Finnish French Galician Georgian German Greek Gujarati Haitian Creole Hausa Hebrew Hindi Hmong Hungarian Icelandic Igbo Indonesian Irish Italian Japanese Javanese Kannada Kazakh Khmer Korean Lao Latin Latvian Lithuanian Macedonian Malagasy Malay Malayalam Maltese Maori Marathi Mongolian Myanmar Burmese Nepali Norwegian Persian Polish Portuguese Punjabi Romanian Russian Serbian Sesotho Sinhala Slovak Slovenian Somali Spanish Sundanese Swahili Swedish Tajik Tamil Telugu Thai Turkish Ukrainian Urdu Uzbek Vietnamese Welsh Yiddish Yoruba Zulu Premium access: With OkTalk Premium Plan you get unlimited access to all features OkTalk Translator has in stock. Acquiring of Premium access will allow you: Remove ads Get unlimited camera translations Use advanced Voice to Voice translations Unlimited Intelligent Object recognition Here are 4 subscription options: 7 day subscription after 3 day trial period costs 7 99 USD 7 day subscription after 3 day trial period costs 4 99 USD an annual subscription costs 59 99 USD. 1 year subscription after 3 day trial period costs 79 99 USD 1 month subscription after 3 day trial period costs 19 99 USD Please note The exact cost may vary depending on your location. Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto renewal may be turned off by going to the user s Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The cost depends on the selected plan.
